plot: A low-life scumbag gets kidnapped by a mysterious gang and put through inhumane training to become a mole inside the police force.
title: Miseuteo Sokeurateseu
plot_es: A low-life scumbag gets kidnapped by a mysterious gang and put through inhumane training to become a mole inside the police force.
plot_en: A low-life scumbag gets kidnapped by a mysterious gang and put through inhumane training to become a mole inside the police force.
